trustfund:
TF038720-CHINA:  CHINA HGUBEI XIAOXIAN
            HIGHWAY, NH2, NH3, NH4,TF036643-CHINA - FOURTH NATIONAL AND
            SECOND FUJIAN PROVINCIAL HGIHWAYS

abstracts.cdata!:
The Hubei Xiaogan - Xiangfan Highway
            Project will provide effective, safe, and efficiently
            managed transport infrastructure, to sustain socioeconomic
            development, trade, and regional integration in Hubei
            Province, as well as improve transport links to lagging
            western provinces. The project components will: 1) increase
            highway capacity, and regional integration, through capital
            investments in the construction of the Xiaogan - Xiangfan
            Expressway (XXE). It will link major industrial, and hub
            cities, and reach less developed counties in the western,
            and mountainous part of Hubei, stimulating socioeconomic
            development; 2) include a rural road improvement program, to
            facilitate accessibility in low-income areas. This component
            comprises various subprojects for the rehabilitation, and
            upgrade of existing road sections. The road selection
            criteria include county income levels, expected impacts on
            the population served, consistency with provincial
            priorities, and, economic rate of return; and, 3) strengthen
            the capacity, and sustainability of highway management in
            the Province, by building sector institutions, and
            facilitating institutional transition to the needs of a
            market economy. To this end, training programs will be
            provided for government agencies on highway planning,
            design, supervision, management and operation, and road safety.
